data_flow: Automatic import of vehicle details and GPS trip miles from Motive ELDs.
Fuel-up data synchronization from Motive fuel cards to QuickBooks expense categories.
Automated IFTA reporting data generation (distance by state/province).
Driver HOS (Hours of Service) logs for payroll reconciliation.
motive-quickbooks.use_case: A trucking fleet using Motive can automatically sync fuel card transactions into QuickBooks, saving ~10 hours per week on manual expense categorization and ensuring IFTA audit readiness.
motive-quickbooks.technical_specs: REST API based synchronization with Webhook support for real-time trip completion events.
motive-quickbooks.prerequisites: Motive Enterprise or Pro plan; QuickBooks Online Plus or Advanced / QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise.

data_flow: Forwarding Settlement Documents (FSD) mapped to SAP Billing Documents.
Supplier invoice accruals transferred from Freight Orders to SAP General Ledger.
Real-time shipment milestone updates (ETA, ATD) synced to SAP Sales & Distribution (SD).
Master data sync (Business Partners, UNLOCO codes) between both systems.
cargowise-sap-s4hana.use_case: International forwarders can automate the transfer of accruals and actual costs into SAP S/4HANA, eliminating the 'financial lag' between operations and corporate finance.
cargowise-sap-s4hana.technical_specs: eAdapter (XML) or REST API integration using SAP Cloud Integration (CPI) as middleware.
cargowise-sap-s4hana.prerequisites: CargoWise One (latest version); SAP S/4HANA 2020 or newer; eAdapter module enabled.

data_flow: Syncing Magaya Invoices and Credit Memos directly to QuickBooks AR.
Magaya Bills and Bill Credits pushed to QuickBooks AP.
Automated sync of Business Entities (Customer/Vendor address books).
Inventory adjustment sync for warehousing operations.
magaya-quickbooks.use_case: Small to mid-sized forwarders can run operations in Magaya while maintaining a clean ledger in QuickBooks without manual double-entry of commercial invoices.
magaya-quickbooks.technical_specs: Magaya QuickBooks Extension using Desktop Sync Tool (XML-based) or QBO API.
magaya-quickbooks.prerequisites: Magaya Supply Chain; QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise v21.0+ or QBO.

data_flow: Direct mapping of CargoWise AR Invoices to NetSuite Sales Invoices.
Shipment Landed Cost data pushed to NetSuite for accurate inventory valuation.
Payment status feedback (NetSuite → CargoWise) to update operational credit holds.
Automated currency conversion and multi-subsidiary mapping.
cargowise-netsuite.use_case: Logistics companies can automate 'Multi-Entity' billing, ensuring that freight costs in CargoWise match the corporate financial reporting in NetSuite in real-time.
cargowise-netsuite.technical_specs: Middleware integration (Celigo, Boomi) using CargoWise eAdapter and NetSuite SuiteTalk API.
cargowise-netsuite.prerequisites: CargoWise One; NetSuite OneWorld (for multi-subsidiary); API Enablement.

data_flow: Voucher and load financial data sync from MercuryGate to NetSuite AP/AR.
Carrier payment status updates for visibility inside the TMS.
GL account mapping for specific freight modes (LTL, FTL, Ocean).
Customer credit limit sync from NetSuite to MercuryGate.
mercurygate-netsuite.use_case: 3PLs can ensure that carrier payments are only released in NetSuite after the load is marked as 'Financial Approved' in MercuryGate, preventing overpayments.
mercurygate-netsuite.technical_specs: REST API based integration using MercuryGate Integration Manager.
mercurygate-netsuite.prerequisites: MercuryGate TMS; NetSuite ERP; REST Web Services enabled in NetSuite.
